fields.name: Neutral Network (Charge 60%):
fields.value: Give your target a random ability from a random role. You may not self-target.

fields.name: Improve Model (2x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Name any ability and give it to your target. You may not self-target.

fields.name: One With The Machine (1x):
fields.value: Use this ability in conjunction with any other ability. You are permitted to self-target with any abilities used tonight, regardless of the role description.
